Articles.Content:
Hello guys!

I\'m new here just made my account so why not say hello?

I was on the Minecraft forums (yes I do play Minecraft) and there was a topic in which you post funny YouTube vids, one of them showed crashing spacecrafts and big explosions. The video wasn\'t funny at all but I was asking myself what kind of game is that?

So I googled for the game, found it, downloaded it and then played it. I tough the poor graphics were YouTube\'s fault, they weren\'t. But I liked the game so the next day I visited the website again and looked for some details. Then I saw the the price, $7.00, what? that\'s about â‚¬5.- That\'s (almost) freaking free.

Well I didn\'t hesitate, I bought the game and played it almost constantly.

The game is quite simple right now but I\'m sure it will be more complicated and more fun later on. I might ask some questions when that time comes. For now, I fully understand the game (I think) and I see forward to upcoming new versions!

see you guys,

GWigWam

Admiral Epsilon

That\'s still a naval rank, if you want the equivilant in other Branches, you should go for Colonel.

And welcome to KSP.

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

(You copy cats are getting old. Try something original for once.)

copy? What exactly did I copy?

Or aren\'t you talking to me.
Capt\'n Skunky basically started a trend of other members greeting first-time posters by using the same message he has arranged in a macro except with their own name.

Hello from Silisko Industries Unlimited. Have a croissant.

(How about that, Skunky? )

copy? What exactly did I copy?

Or aren\'t you talking to me.

As Spoot says, I was referring to the people that have taken to copying my greeting. While I understand that imitation is the greatest form of flattery, it\'s just getting old at this point.

Hello from Silisko Industries Unlimited. Have a croissant.

(How about that, Skunky? )

Hmm, I dunno, do I get a croissant too?

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

Hmm, I dunno, do I get a croissant too?

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

You didn\'t read the disclaimer written in portable size 0.01pt front conveniently located at a portable location on the portable post.

Here I\'ll magnify it for you (with this portable magnifier)

*ADMINS AND MODS EXCLUDED FROM THIS LIMITED TIME OFFER

pft Nova wrote that and I was able to read it.
